data.title: One of the better options in Chula Vista
data.text: Chula Vista is not graced with may non-chain restaurants so even though the food is not spectacular is a solid italian place.  Prices are fair, decor is nice and service was solid

data.title: Great Italian!!
data.text:
I love the little bottle of vinegar & oil they put on the table---the bread is so delicious that I always eat too much!!
Chicken Piccata is the best!!!

data.title: vongole!!!
data.text: Lived in Italy for 3 years and really missed the spaghetti vongole and this place had it! Hit the spot too. Waiter was nice even though our toddler destroyed the white table linen with spaghetti sauce. Food came out quickly and we enjoyed our meals.

data.title: Charm in Chula Vista..
data.text: Wonderful small Italian restaurant. Great proprietor, authentic menu and nice wines. What else can you ask for!

data.title: Excellent food
data.text:
Went for Dinner, as usual the service was impeccable,my wife ordered the dayl special Risotto Pescadore,excellent,myself Fetucini Alfredo,delicious .
Highly recommend  Italianissimo,for quiet meal.

data.title: One of the Best Italian Restaurant in San Diego
data.text:
Great food. Very authentic. 
You will not be disappointed.
Pasta is exceptional. Meat and fish dishes are also very good and the pizza is a gem.

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: I am a frequent client, love their food, ambiance and personal service.  The owner is there greeting you and waiters know your name.  Great wine selection !😊

data.title: Real Italian food in a cozy place!
data.text:
I frequently travel in US for both business and leasure with my family, and always enjoy trying Italian restaurant abroad. Italianissimo is one of the best I found and for sure the best in the San Diego area.
Real Italian food, great variety of Italian wines, Italian chef and Emanuele is so friendly and professional.
In a 2 days stay in San Diego we chose it the 1st day following the good reviews and we couldn't avoid to come back the 2nd day
All the pasta choices are excellent as well as the lasagne. We tryed both fish and meat dishes and they were delicious. The bread is real Italian crisp and warm. The tiramisù is one of the best dessert! My 2 kids are still mentioning it
Strongly raccomanded!

data.title: Great authentic Italian food.
data.text: Excellent Italian food, service is great and the prices a reasonable.I have returned on 3 different occasions and haven't had any negative experiences.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: Tried this restaurant after seeing on trip advisor.  4 of us and we all loved our meals from appetizer to dessert.  Great service from friendly servers   Will return.

data.title: Authentic, Delicious, & Relaxed
data.text: First, it was so nice to hear Italian being spoken by both customers and people working there. The food was phenomenal! Loved our salads, entrees, and desserts. Win, win, win! Terrific service, too. There were so many things on the menu I wanted to try that I can't wait to go back. I ended up with lamb shank and my husband ordered eggplant parmigiano. Both were awesome!

data.title: Great food, generous
data.text:
Thinking we would be reviewing great Mexican food in Chula Vista, here I am raving about Italian. 
The food was amazing and the portions generous. Tasty, fresh and reasonably priced. 
Recommend. Easy.

data.title: Excellent food
data.text: Homemade pasta, individual preparations, taste calamari and of course the stuck up waiter which lead to a memorable mean

data.title: Sunday evening date with the hubby
data.text: We loved our food.  can't remember too much its been a few months.  Waitress was an older lady, a bit on the dry grouchy side but knew the menu well.  I think it was the owner that came and asked us how everything was when we were getting ready to leave.  Explained it was our first time and that we had really enjoyed our meal.

data.title: Great food unique dishes
data.text: Nice place in downtown Chula Vista. Super friendly staff. Great service. We had the fried calmari. Zucchini soup and tortellini with mushrooms and peas. All top quality and delicious. I have really bad luck with most Italian restaurants. But this place is awesome.

data.title: Fabulous!
data.text: I found this place on Trip Advisor.  I had just gotten into town and had missed lunch, so I thought I'd splurge on a nice dinner with wine.  I had the cioppino (seafood stew) and dinner salad, and chose a nice red wine to go with it.  The stew was so chock full of shellfish and fish, I couldn't believe they could sell it for only $20 and change.  The wine was delish.  Very very happy to have found this place on my first night in town!

data.title: Italy in Chula Vista
data.text: Amazing Food! This place is my favorite Place in the whole world! Why go to Italy when you can have there food right here in Chula Vista Ca! This place has the best food and service. Yes,the prices are high but it's worth very dime. It's a small place but they still have place for a party as long as you reserved with time. I like to go during the week. Less people and more attention to me. Again, this place has won my month, taste buds and heart! Thank you for having the best food EVER!!! I'll see you guys for my birthday next month!!

data.title: Worthy of its ranking.
data.text: We chose it due to its ranking and were not disappointed.  We had spent the day at the zoo and were looking for a place to do dinner and found it.  We hadnt made reservations so had a 20 minute wait but well worth it.

data.title: WOW!!!
data.text: Funny thing we came to Chula Vista for Mexican food and end up in the best Italian restaurant in town. HIGHLY RECOMMEND it.... Service was great but food was amazing. We will definitely come back.

data.title: Dinner
data.text:
We are visiting San Diego as part of our vacation, so far been to San Francisco, Vegas, Palm Springs and now staying with family in Chula Vista.

We couldn't find anywhere down town that has cheap parking and reasonably priced food so we decided to try and find somewhere on our way back to CV- so glad we did as we stumbled across this restaurant and our meal was the best meal of our trip so far.

I had two glasses of the house red which was better than the usual house wine and my husband had Coke (designated driver) and he never once asked for a refill- the staff approached us 4 times to offer him a refill - even when he'd finished his meal. They were all really friendly and the service was excellent. 

I had a leg of lamb with fettuccini in tomato herb sauce and it was outstanding, he had chicken in bread crumbs with veg and potato. I can't stress how much we enjoyed the food, I couldn't fit a dessert in as we were supposed to be having cake with family later that night but I did have a look and was seriously tempted. Reasonably priced too. 

Thank you for a lovely meal!
